claim: Napoleon led troops into Ottoman Syria and Egypt with the goal of protecting French trade interests.
LM: In 1798 , he led a military expedition to Egypt that served as a springboard to political power . claim: Texas shares a border with a place.
LM: Geographically located in the South Central region of the country , Texas shares borders with the U.S. states of Louisiana to the east , Arkansas to the northeast , Oklahoma to the north , New Mexico to the west , and the Mexican states of Chihuahua , Coahuila , Nuevo León , and Tamaulipas to the southwest , while the Gulf of Mexico is to the southeast . New Mexico ( Nuevo México   ; Yootó Hahoodzo  ) is a state located in the southwestern region of the United States of America . Mexico ( México ,  , modern Nahuatl ) , officially the United Mexican States  , is a federal republic in the southern portion of North America . Coahuila  , formally Coahuila de Zaragoza  , officially the Free and Sovereign State of Coahuila de Zaragoza ( Estado Libre y Soberano de Coahuila de Zaragoza ) , is one of the 31 states which , along with Mexico City , compose the 32 Federal Entities of Mexico . Arkansas  is a state located in the southeastern region of the United States . Louisiana (  Louisiana French : La Louisiane ,  or  Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ; Standard French État de Louisiane ,  ) is a state located in the southern region of the United States . Chihuahua  , officially the Free and Sovereign State of Chihuahua ( Estado Libre y Soberano de Chihuahua ) , is one of the 32 states of Mexico . Oklahoma (  Cherokee : Asgaya gigageyi / ᎠᏍᎦᏯ ᎩᎦᎨᏱ ; Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state in the South Central region of the United States .

claim: Law of value appeared first in a book called, in French, Misere de la philosophie and it was significant.

The Poverty of Philosophy ( French : Misère de la philosophie ) is a book by Karl Marx published in Paris and Brussels in 1847 , where he lived in exile from 1843 until 1849 .
